text: Hello how are you today?
Hello. I am great! How are you?
I am doing well. Are you aware of the charity Save the Children?
I have heard of it, but don't know anything about it.
It is a great charity. It helps children all around the world.
What do they do?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
that is a really vague answer.
A specific example is helping children in war torn countries like Syria.
but how exactly do they help them?
By giving aid such as food.
That sounds great. Do they provide education also?
Yes, you can learn more here.  URL
thanks. I will check it out.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now?
I really feel like I should research it more.
Even a few cents helps.
I really need the money from Mturk. That's why I'm here.
Me too but I think some one else could benefit much more than you and I could from 10 cents
You seem really passionate about this non-profit. I just checked their website. Their annual report looks good.
Will you donate that small amount?
